Otonyetarie Okoye bụ onye Rivers Steetị Naijirịa, onye ọka iwu na onye ọrụ gọọmentị

Ọ bụ ugbu a odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide nke Rivers State Ministry of Agriculture. Okoye ṅụrụ iyi na Government House, Port Harcourt na 11 Disemba 2013. Tupu nke ahụ, ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke ndị ọkàiwu ọha na eze nke Rivers State.
